comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Welcome to the forum.You can start by getting yourself a  copper member account.  It will enable you to add some images to your ANN thread, which could be a little bit informative and detailed.

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Quote from: Nwada001 on September 20, 2023, 01:48:09 PMWelcome to the forum You can start by getting your self a  copper member account Yes, this is a typical mistake made by new projects announced on the forum. Not buying a copper membership to make the OP of the thread look decent. With the competition in this section, making mistakes like this takes away a lot of points, but the OP has time to fix it and edit the OP once he/she has the copper membership.Another thing I would avoid is "trusted" if there is no one trusted in the casino who can vouch for them by leaving positive feedback for deals they have done or positive experiences that convey trustworthiness. That you say of yourself that you are trusted does not mean anything to me, because scammers also say it.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Is this happening to just me? The most of the images are not loading including the first page when you wan to sign up in the site, and I also tried to access the terms and conditions page but it just kept loading nothing is working. Please someone should confirm if it’s just only on my end. As for the thread, you should work on it and follow the suggestion of the above post>>> buy a copper membership and edit your post to make it look catchy.

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: Welcome mate. It's nice having you here. You have a good website to start with. Your UI and graphics are quite alright. I registered on your website and I saw promocode and I was thinking if you had any promotion for bitcointalk members who first registered on your platform that would be nice as it would attract more clients and possibly they would give you an honest review about your casino which would enhance further developments on your casino. I noticed your email was first sent to my junk box before I had to verify my authenticity to activate my account. If I may ask do you have an app because while going through the platform I noticed a notification on my screen with a download metaspins instructions or prompt. I also noticed that your customer support chat system is very poor. You kept a bot there and unserious customer care service. I think you need to improve on it.The 1 bonus on my dashboard is what I would need explanations on because I tried clicking on it and not clickable. Lastly, I would suggest you hid to the idea of upgrading your account to a copper member so you can be able to upload your casino here as your first impression matters here.

comments.author: maydna
comments.body: Welcome to Bitcointalk.You can follow what @Nwada001 and @Cantsay suggest so that you can add images to your ANN.@OP, it looks like you need to reduce the width of your homepage to make it look better. I noticed some of the image displayed on the right and left, so you need to adjust it again.That's if you want to adjust it, but if you don't, that's okay because it's not a serious problem.Here is the image for those who curious:

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: Cantsay on September 20, 2023, 01:54:57 PMIs this happening to just me? The most of the images are not loading including the first page when you wan to sign up in the site, and I also tried to access the terms and conditions page but it just kept loading nothing is working. Please someone should confirm if it’s just only on my end. I don't know if this was fixed as soon as you complained about it or if it was a network error, but I just checked now and notice that everything is working fine, at least from my end. Both the front page image and that of the signups page have loaded successfully. I even went ahead and checked the terms and conditions, and it's now all good as it took less than a minute for the entire pdf file to load completely on my mobile device. Forgive my screenshot as it's taken with my mobile and I don't know how perfect it will appear in the eyes of others.

comments.author: Helena Yu
comments.body: Welcome to the forum.The interface of your casino looks new and fresh unlike most of new casinos that copying other old casinos. With various cryptos, payment options and providers you have, I believe you can compete against the other casino.Your loyalty program are big, but sadly you don't have sports book yet.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Welcome to the Forum, and I hope you have a very comfortable stay here.  I have given a look to your web-side and I must say I like the design of your casino. Since the name of your casino is called Hold n Spin, I would expect your casino to have a very good selection of dices and slots. If you have some luck and keep your casino in a good shape long enough, then you could also start a signature campaign or even better: a review campaign, so more people can be aware of your service.Anyways, Good luck!

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: Quote from: Holdnspin on September 20, 2023, 01:45:14 PM1.) 50 Freespins on Register without Deposit for the Top slot Provider Pragmatic Play.Welcome to bitcointalk forum!I registered on HoldnSpin website and I wanted to test how everything is working but I didnt receive any 50 Freespins in my account.When I clicked on Pragmatic Play clots I was asked to fill my personal details and after that I was asked to choose default coins and to deposit money.How can we claim those freespins without sending deposit?

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: It looks like Casino Hold Spin is interesting, plus as the OP said below. Hope it's not a bigger rope than a horse.Quote from: Holdnspin on September 20, 2023, 01:45:14 PMcenter]Hold''N''Spin offers great Welcome offers and overall Bonuses:1.) 50 Freespins on Register without Deposit for the Top slot Provider Pragmatic Play.2.) Good overall Deposit Bonuses with low Wager Requirements 3.) Weekly Non-Sticky Bonuses That's something extraordinary for a new casino to come here 50 Freespins, users do not require a deposit, this makes me a little curious about Hold'N'Spin casinos.simple question for OP.* for the first point, are you really serious about it, treating users who gamble at Hold'N'Spin casinos.What if users really achieve success in 50 Freespins, can they withdraw their money without a deposit, who knows what to do with 50 Freespins at the end of the story there are rules that must be completed again to get all that.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: for anyone who will register on their gambling site because of the register bonus, I just want to inform you guys about this rule(quoted below) on their ToS just in case you haven't read it. it basically says that after you register you have seven days to provide the needed documents that were mentioned on their ToS and if you fail to provide those, your account might be suspended. they can also perform "verification checks" on you from time to time. Quote from: https://www.holdnspin.com/en/contacts/terms-and-conditionsAll your documents as per list above need to be provided by You to us in 7 (seven) days after opening of Your account or if requested to You by support – in 7 (seven) days after date of respective request. We will review Your document(s) in 7 (seven) day time after receipt of the respective document(s). In case You fail to provide necessary document(s) in due time We may suspend use of Your account or decline Your withdrawal request (as applicable).

comments.author: panjul07
comments.body: Quote from: YOSHIE on September 20, 2023, 03:55:03 PMIt looks like Casino Hold Spin is interesting, plus as the OP said below. Hope it's not a bigger rope than a horse.Quote from: Holdnspin on September 20, 2023, 01:45:14 PMcenter]Hold''N''Spin offers great Welcome offers and overall Bonuses:1.) 50 Freespins on Register without Deposit for the Top slot Provider Pragmatic Play.2.) Good overall Deposit Bonuses with low Wager Requirements 3.) Weekly Non-Sticky Bonuses That's something extraordinary for a new casino to come here 50 Freespins, users do not require a deposit, this makes me a little curious about Hold'N'Spin casinos.simple question for OP.* for the first point, are you really serious about it, treating users who gamble at Hold'N'Spin casinos.What if users really achieve success in 50 Freespins, can they withdraw their money without a deposit, who knows what to do with 50 Freespins at the end of the story there are rules that must be completed again to get all that.Based on what I read on their terms page, yes you can withdraw after you complete the wagering requirement (I'm not sure how much) and the max amount to withdraw from the free spins without any deposit is 50EUR. Basically it is not something extraordinary, it was really common thing in online crypto casinos but we all know that it is hard to complete the wagering requirement. Most of the time, players lost all the winning from the free spins before completing the wagering requirement.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: YOSHIE on September 20, 2023, 03:55:03 PMWhat if users really achieve success in 50 Freespins, can they withdraw their money without a deposit, who knows what to do with 50 Freespins at the end of the story there are rules that must be completed again to get all that.Obviously, no casino is just going to hand over free bonuses just like that with no strings attached or else they will just keep losing money won through the bonuses without people depositing anythingLet me help you, this is what you might wanna readQuote from: https://www.holdnspin.com/en/contacts/terms-and-conditions9. BONUSES9.1. HoldSpin reserves the right to remove, add or change any bonus that is available in the account of any Customer and has not been claimed. Any claimed and active bonus will not be removed by HoldSpin under regular circumstances.9.2. Bonuses might have wagering requirements attached to them. These requirements will be appropriately displayed before the Customer decides to use a bonus when wagering requirements are applicable. Withdrawal amounts will be only possible for the real money balance the bonus money balance upon withdrawal will be lost. HoldSpin has the right to choose which game and service contributes what amount to the wagering requirements. The wagering requirements have a minimum of 25 times the amount of bonus and the real money sum contributing to the bonus figure.9.3. Bonuses can be received once per person (Customer), per household, per address, per mobile phone, per shared computer and per shared IP address. Risk-free bets on any games or services do not count toward the wagering requirements. Winnings from free spins are added to the bonus money balance unless otherwise provided in the specific bonus terms attributable to each bonus.9.4. The maximum amount of money to be won from a no deposit free spin bonus and gameplay with mentioned bonus funds is 50 EUR or any other currency equivalent. Any winnings exceeding 50 EUR without making a real money deposit and fulfillment of wagering requirements will be void and will be kept by HoldSpin. Example, a customer receives a no deposit free spins bonus. The free spins get played out and the customer wins 10 EUR. The customer proceeds to play other games with the money, previously won from free spins, and without wagering real money as per wagering requirements, and wins 90 EUR, totalling 100 EUR in the HoldSpin cashier. In this case the customer has exceeded the cap of 50 EUR winnings, 50 EUR will be available for withdrawing and 50 EUR will be kept byHoldSpin.9.5. The maximum bet when having an active bonus is EUR 5 per spin or EUR 0.5 per bet line. HoldSpin reserves the right to void bets and wager turnovers resulting from larger bets made on games and/or services of HoldSpin.9.6. HoldSpin reserves the right to impose various restrictions to different countries where Customers may reside regarding bonuses for reasons we deem appropriate. We further reserve the right to offer specific bonuses to individual customers or customer groups and their termination, change or other alteration without explanation and/or compensations in any form.9.7. If a player or a group of players are abusing casino bonuses HoldSpin has the right to confiscate any wins thereof and to close the players account(s). Abusive behaviour towards bonuses and/or bonus abuse means:i) A Player places bets and/or wagers amounting to the maximum allowed per bonus terms to raise the variance in order increase the balanceii) Player lowers the bet and/or wager size after a big win and changes the game to one with a lower volatilityiii) Player makes deposits to cap out the bonus amount but not more. Applicable to match bonuses of 50% and aboveAfter the account has been flagged as bonus abusing it is forbidden to use any other bonuses and/or participate in promotions at HoldSpin.

comments.author: Eureka_07
comments.body: Quote from: Holdnspin on September 20, 2023, 01:45:14 PM<snip>Yo, welcome to the forum. I am interested in trying this one out. But before that, do you require KYC identification? If so, when do you request it?Also, what is this "something" that you are referring to?It's great to see that you have a landing page for visitors who come from a restricted region. It helps a lot for both your part and the customer.Furthermore, I don't see the gambling license badge along with the authentication display on your website, aren't these required if you are regulated?

comments.author: Bitinity
comments.body: Quote from: Eureka_07 on September 21, 2023, 03:57:34 AMYo, welcome to the forum. I am interested in trying this one out. But before that, do you require KYC identification? If so, when do you request it?Here is their term related to KYC that tell us there are 2 possibilities when it will be asked but based on below we can say that KYC is mandatory here and high possibility that the 7days after opening account is their standard term that is being used for most of their players. Quote5.6 All your documents as per list above need to be provided by You to us in 7 (seven) days after opening of Your account or if requested to You by support – in 7 (seven) days after date of respective request. We will review Your document(s) in 7 (seven) day time after receipt of the respective document(s). In case You fail to provide necessary document(s) in due time We may suspend use of Your account or decline Your withdrawal request (as applicable).Quote from: Eureka_07 on September 21, 2023, 03:57:34 AMFurthermore, I don't see the gambling license badge along with the authentication display on your website, aren't these required if you are regulated?There is, you can scroll down to the bottom of the page, it is placed above the 18+ logo.
